sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { useCartDispatch } from "../context/CartContext";
import "../styles/Home.css";

const products = [
  { 
    id: 1, 
    name: "Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 Laptop", 
    brand: "Lenovo",
    price: 45999, 
    originalPrice: 55999,
    rating: "4.2 (5,432)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1588702547923-7093a6c3ba33?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Laptop on desk
    details: "15.6 inch, 8GB RAM" 
  },
  { 
    id: 2, 
    name: "Samsung Galaxy M14 5G Smartphone", 
    brand: "Samsung",
    price: 12999, 
    originalPrice: 16999,
    rating: "4.1 (28,765)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574944985070-8f3ebc6b79d2?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Black smartphone
    details: "128GB, Black" 
  },
  { 
    id: 3, 
    name: "Puma Unisex Running Shoes", 
    brand: "Puma",
    price: 2499, 
    originalPrice: 4999,
    rating: "4.0 (16,543)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1595950653106-6c9ebd614d3a?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Red/white sneakers
    details: "Sports Shoes" 
  },
  { 
    id: 4, 
    name: "Sony WH-CH720N Noise Canceling Headphones", 
    brand: "Sony",
    price: 8999, 
    originalPrice: 12999,
    rating: "4.3 (11,234)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1546435770-a3e426bf472b?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Black headphones
    details: "Wireless Bluetooth" 
  },
  { 
    id: 5, 
    name: "Apple iPhone 14 Pro", 
    brand: "Apple",
    price: 129900, 
    originalPrice: 139900,
    rating: "4.5 (25,432)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1678985453876-45acea91c23d?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // iPhone purple
    details: "128GB, Deep Purple" 
  },
  { 
    id: 6, 
    name: "Nike Air Max 270 React", 
    brand: "Nike",
    price: 6999, 
    originalPrice: 9999,
    rating: "4.2 (18,765)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1600185365483-26d7a4cc7519?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Nike shoes
    details: "Men's Running Shoes" 
  },
  { 
    id: 7, 
    name: "Canon EOS R50 Mirrorless Camera", 
    brand: "Canon",
    price: 54999, 
    originalPrice: 64999,
    rating: "4.4 (3,421)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1502920917128-1aa500764cbd?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Black camera
    details: "24.2MP, 4K Video" 
  },
  { 
    id: 8, 
    name: "Boat Storm Pro Smartwatch", 
    brand: "boAt",
    price: 2799, 
    originalPrice: 4999,
    rating: "4.1 (12,543)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1434494878577-86c23bcb06b9?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Black smartwatch
    details: "1.3 inch Display" 
  },
  { 
    id: 9, 
    name: "Dell XPS 13 Plus Laptop", 
    brand: "Dell",
    price: 89999, 
    originalPrice: 99999,
    rating: "4.3 (7,890)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1541807084-5c52b6b3adef?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Silver laptop
    details: "13.4 inch, Intel i7, 16GB RAM" 
  },
  { 
    id: 10, 
    name: "JBL Flip 6 Bluetooth Speaker", 
    brand: "JBL",
    price: 8999, 
    originalPrice: 11999,
    rating: "4.2 (9,876)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558618666-fcd25c85cd64?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Bluetooth speaker
    details: "Portable Wireless Speaker" 
  },
  { 
    id: 11, 
    name: "Xiaomi Mi 11X Pro 5G", 
    brand: "Xiaomi",
    price: 28999, 
    originalPrice: 34999,
    rating: "4.0 (15,234)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1567721913486-6585f069b332?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Modern smartphone
    details: "256GB, Cosmic Black" 
  },
  { 
    id: 12, 
    name: "Adidas Ultraboost 22", 
    brand: "Adidas",
    price: 12999, 
    originalPrice: 16999,
    rating: "4.1 (8,765)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551698618-1dfe5d97d256?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // White sneakers
    details: "Running Shoes" 
  },
  { 
    id: 13, 
    name: "iPad Air 5th Generation", 
    brand: "Apple",
    price: 59900, 
    originalPrice: 64900,
    rating: "4.4 (6,543)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1586953208448-b95a79798f07?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // iPad
    details: "10.9 inch, 64GB, WiFi" 
  },
  { 
    id: 14, 
    name: "OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite 5G", 
    brand: "OnePlus",
    price: 19999, 
    originalPrice: 22999,
    rating: "4.0 (11,234)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1511707171634-5f897ff02aa9?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Modern phone
    details: "128GB, Pastel Lime" 
  },
  { 
    id: 15, 
    name: "Marshall Acton III Speaker", 
    brand: "Marshall",
    price: 24999, 
    originalPrice: 29999,
    rating: "4.5 (4,321)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1608043152269-423dbba4e7e1?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Speaker
    details: "Bluetooth Home Speaker" 
  },
  { 
    id: 16, 
    name: "HP Pavilion Gaming Laptop", 
    brand: "HP",
    price: 65999, 
    originalPrice: 75999,
    rating: "4.2 (5,876)",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1593640408182-31c70c8268f5?w=300&h=200&fit=crop", // Gaming laptop
    details: "15.6 inch, RTX 3050, 16GB RAM" 
  }
];
